description: This wreath is hand-made and can be either hung or used as a table centerpiece. We start with a grapevine wreath and add moss and quality succulent rosettes that are grown in Southern California.

Easy maintenance, just keep them in lots of bright sunlight, avoiding harsh direct noon rays in summer. Drench with water every week or when moss is very dry.Succulent plants have a beautiful floral shape but are actually living plants! They'll grow and thrive with little care and surprise you with a showy display of colorful, long-lasting blooms.
Our process and materials ensure the highest quality product. Our wreaths are made to stay looking beautiful for years.
Perfect Valentine or Mother's Day gift, exquisite Wedding Centerpiece and the perfect Housewarming gift, Girlfriend gift, Birthday or Sympathy gift- anytime you think to send flowers.
Since each wreath is handmade, please allow 5 to 7 days for processing prior to shipping.
data.title: 18" Fresh Live Succulent Wreath: Fully Covered
